FuncDef: This command specifies when and if to generate alarms and alarm clear notifications for this port.
CLIs: report-alarm [ signal-fail ] [ remote ] [ local ] [ no-frame-lock ] [ high-ber ] [ no-block-lock ] [ no-am-lock ] [ duplicate-lane ]
no report-alarm [ signal-fail ] [ remote ] [ local ] [ no-frame-lock ] [ high-ber ] [ no-block-lock ] [ no-am-lock ] [ duplicate-lane ]

ParaDef.Info: Reports an Ethernet signal lost alarm.
Reports a 'not locked on the Ethernet framing sequence' alarm.
Reports 40G/100G PCS Lanes Not Block Locked.
Reports 40G/100G PCS Alignment Marker Loss of Lock.
